# Euphorbia herman-schwartzii

|genus = Euphorbia
|species = herman-schwartzii
|authority = Rauh
}}
Euphorbia herman-schwartzii is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is endemic to Madagascar.  Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and rocky areas. It is threatened by habitat loss.
